full_text: Page 2751 MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET M-TIER DATE: 07/25/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 706 1207 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 103 102 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 408 409 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1234 1231 8:30- 9:00 AM 031 033 4:30-5:00 PM 438 439 1:00-1:30 AM 711 712 9:00-9:30 AM 004 9:30-10:00 AM 0925 0937 5:00 -5:30 PM 516 517 1:30-2:00 AM 135 136 10:00-10:30 AM 1003 1005 6:00-6:30 PM 674 675 2:00-2:30 AM 708 211 10:30-11:00 AM 1031 1035 6:30-7:00 PM 638 639 2:30-3:00 AM 242 243 11:00-11:30 AM 7:00-7:30 PM 710 711 3:00-3:30 AM 313 314 11:30-12:00 AM 7:30-8:00 PM 741 742 3:30-4:00 AM 342 343 12:00-12:30 PM 8:00-8:30 PM 816 817 4:00-4:30 AM 418 419 12:30- 1:00 PM 8:30- 9:00 PM 838 839 4:30-5:00 AM 438 437 1:00-1:30 PM 9:00-9:30 PM 916 917 5:00 -5:30 AM 519 520 1:30-2:00 PM 9:30-10:00 PM 940 941 5:30-6:00 AM 542 543 2:00-2:30 PM 10:00-10:30 PM 1016 1017 6:00-6:30 AM 615 616 2:30-3:00 PM 10:30-11:00 PM 1037 1039 6:30-7:00 AM 642 643 3:00-3:30 PM 11:00-11:30 PM 1121 1122 7:00-7:30 AM 718 719 3:30-4:00 PM 11:30-12:00 PM 1142 1143 7:30-8:00 AM 746 747 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN DOJ-OGR-00026407

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET M-TIER

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten entries in the check sheet table and has several redacted signatures.
